title: DNA origami: thinking ‘outside the fold’ for direct integrity testing of membranes for virus removal in potable reuse applications
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00285G, Paper

Hannah Ray, Katerina Papp, Leopold Green, Boo Shan Tseng, Eric Dickenson, Daniel Gerrity
Increasing water scarcity and water quality impairment are drivers for broader implementation of potable reuse. To maximize the sustainability of these systems, it is important to address pathogen log reduction value (LRV) ‘gaps’.
